data.title: Pediatrics
data.text:
You Might Like To Know

Kristi Hall, APRN started her medical career in 2008 after graduating from Hazard Community & Technical College. She went straight into critical care as a registered nurse in emergency department at Hazard ARH until 2010. She then traveled to Pikeville Medical Center where she worked as staff RN in the emergency department for the following 3 1/2 years. It was June 2014 that she completed her Masters of Science at Frontier Nursing University in Hyden, Ky and she became a Family Nurse Practitioner. The next 7 1/2 years she practice family medicine as an APRN for Quantum Healthcare in Hazard, Ky. As of February 2022 she is now a part of the Compassion Pediatrics team. She is the provider that is residing in the brand new pediatric clinic in Wayland, Ky. She is very excited to start this aspect of her career because this rural community is near and dear to her heart. She is a mother to two beautiful children and a wife to her high school sweetheart. She is anxious to start taking care of all the little ones throughout her community.
